title: Love Island's Amber Gill shares a glimpse of her new home as she splurges her winnings
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island winner Amber Gill celebrated her moving day with a snap of her inside her lavish new London pad.

Amber, 22, has revealed she's "finally" moved into her own home and took to Instagram to mark the celebratory occasion with her close friends, while teasing followers with a glimpse of the London property.

Earlier in the day, the brunette beauty shared a clip to her Instagram story of her friend pushing her on a lie-flat trolley with the caption: "Finally got my keys after a longggg day".

In another snap, the beautician posed in her sparkling new kitchen and wrote: "And eventually I am in… Now it’s time to furnish the life out of this place."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

With sleek white cabinets, dark oak features and a large open-plan design, there is plenty of room for Amber to get creative and make the pad her home.

The Geordie beauty celebrated her purchase by popping open a bottle of champagne and toasting the big day with some friends.

Amber has landed her own place after she moved in with her Love Island BFF Anna Vakili for a short while following her time in the Love Island villa.

She told The Sun in September: "I’ve moved in with Anna which is lovely, she’s been with me from the start".

(Image: Instagram)

The TV personality has had an exciting few months and secured a high income with her lucrative £1 million contract from her MissPap clothing collection.

Her Love Island co-stars released their collections with various retailers instantly upon leaving the villa, however Amber chose to bide her time and waited to release her brand-deal.

The feisty TV babe won Love Island this summer alongside Irish hunk Greg O'Shea .

(Image: Instagram)

However winning the show didn't appear to keep the couple together as Greg dumped his former flame by text just five weeks after they returned home.

The couple claimed they were too busy to pursue their romance and "haven't had enough quality time" with each other since leaving the villa.

It was claimed he dumped her by text, leaving her feeling 'used' and 'devastated'.

(Image: Instagram)

Amber recently hit headlines after her Love Island co-star Yewande Biala accidentally posted a 'really drunk' video of her as she danced at her boozy MissPap launch party.

The video uncovered a very worse for wear Amber as she made faces and sang at the camera.

The scientist swiftly deleted the video but not before thousands of fans commented on Amber's drunk state.
description: The Love Island winner has finally found the perfect abode to splurge her winnings from the ITV2 dating show on and celebrated her grand purchase
